name: Battle Test: A Nissan Rogue 360° VR Experience
name_original: Battle Test: A Nissan Rogue 360° VR Experience
description: Join the Rebellion and face the might of the Galactic Empire in Nissan’s Battle Test. Jump into the front seat of the new 2017 Nissan Rogue then jump into the action. Dodge simulated threats right out of ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY as this immersive 360° VR experience throws one danger after another at you from every angle. You’ll discover how much you can miss while driving, and how Nissan Intelligent Safety Shield Technologies have got your back.
